org.epics.ioc.support.pdrv
Interface PortDriverLink

public interface PortDriverLink

PortDriverLink. Implemented by PortDriverLinkFactory. Everything in the structure this supports is controlled by PortDriverLink.

Author:
mrk

Method Summary
 byte[] expandByteBuffer(int size)
          Expand the byte buffer.
 AlarmSupport getAlarmSupport()
          Get the alarmSupport, which must for an alarm field in the structure the portDriverLink supports.
 byte[] getByteBuffer()
          Get a byte buffer.
 User getUser()
          Get the User.
 

Method Detail

getUser

User getUser()
Get the User.

Returns:
The interface.

getAlarmSupport

AlarmSupport getAlarmSupport()
Get the alarmSupport, which must for an alarm field in the structure the portDriverLink supports.

Returns:
The interface.

getByteBuffer

byte[] getByteBuffer()
Get a byte buffer. In the byte buffer is null when this is called an 80 element buffer is allocated.

Returns:
The buffer.

expandByteBuffer

byte[] expandByteBuffer(int size)
Expand the byte buffer. A new buffer is allocated only if the current buffer is null or smaller than size. If a buffer already exists it is copied into the new buffer.

Parameters:
size - The number of elements required.
Returns:
The new buffer.
